More Generative Art for MozFest 2016 aka pixel sorting part 2

Oct 1, 2016

Pontifications

  • Following on from yesterday, this post has more generative art generated by pixel sort.
  • How did I make the following? Simple! Ha :-) ! Seriously by using the pxlsrt ruby gem and the first 67200 photos of instagram Vancouver 2016. Full details over on the mozfest2016 genart github repo (scroll down to "October 1, 2016")

Pixel Sorted fun art, enjoy!
